Texts.Eng: I don't mean to interrupt your training regimen, but I have noticed the weapons you employ could be made more versatile. I have calculated that reverse engineering illegal weapons may yield much needed results. Thus, you should go fight Bandits and Space-Faring Robots for these parts.^white;

These illegal gun parts can be used to make an impressive gun. You'll need to create a specific mechanism, though, but I've already created one for you. Go build the Versa in an anvil once you make the second mechanism!
